mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_INFO(image_url, file_name, user_seq) VALUES(#{imageUrl}, #{fileName}, #{userSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT f.file_seq, f.file_name, f.image_url, f.user_seq, f.created_at, f.modified_at FROM FILE_INFO f WHERE f.file_seq = #{fileSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FILE_INFO f WHERE f.file_seq = #{fileSeq}
